participant_1.name: Ella Thompson
participant_1.personality: Quirky and introspective, enjoys deep conversations and has a unique perspective on everyday life.
participant_1.background: I am allergic to shellfish and cats. My mother has 500 pairs of shoes. I like having my back scratched. I have 1 pair of shoes. I only eat at restaurants.

participant_2.name: Lucas Carter
participant_2.personality: Friendly and outgoing, enjoys social interactions and is always up for trying new activities.
participant_2.background: I like to play tennis. My favorite food is a burger. I work as an accountant. My favorite musical is Hamilton.

content.text: Hello, I'm a bit of an oddball.
That's okay, I'm sure I can handle it.
Well, I have a few allergies, I am allergic to shellfish and cats.
That must be tough, I can't imagine life without shellfish.
Yeah, it can be a pain, but I've managed to find ways to work around it.
That's good to hear. What else about you is odd?
Well, I like to have my back scratched.
That's an interesting one. Do you have a reason for that?
I'm not sure, I've just always liked it.
I'm not sure I understand, but I'm not judging.
Thanks. What about you, what's your favorite thing about yourself?
I'm not sure I have one favorite thing about myself, but I like to think I'm a good listener.
That's a good trait to have. What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play tennis, go for walks, and watch movies.
Tennis sounds fun, I've always wanted to try it but I'm not very coordinated.
It's not too hard to learn, and it's a great way to get exercise.
Maybe I'll give it a try sometime. What's your favorite musical?
My favorite musical is Hamilton, it's so good!
I've heard good things about it, I'll have to check it out.
You should, it's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation, I appreciate it.
